title: Focus on distance and propagation speed
text:
Propagation delay depends only on the physical length of the link and the propagation speed of the signal — not on packet size or transmission rate.
Use the formula:
$$ d_{prop} = \dfrac{\text{length of link (meters)}}{\text{propagation speed (meters/second)}} $$
Make sure your units match before dividing.
